definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Converting the graphical work into code
sentences.chinese: 將圖形界面轉化成代碼。

sentences.english: We will provide the whole GUI diagrams and PSDs.
sentences.chinese: 我們將提供全圖形界面圖和月臺幕門。

sentences.english: At some point in time a user will need to know all that some GUIs hide.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，用戶需要知道那些圖形界面後面隱藏的信息。

sentences.english: Implement a graphical interface that lets users pick values for the preferences.
sentences.chinese: 實現一個允許用戶爲首選項選擇值的圖形界面。

sentences.english: This is traditional behavior in a terminal, but in graphical software, progress feedback is crucial.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於一個圖形界面來說，這有着至關重要的作用。

sentences.english: By using graphical menus and keyboard shortcuts.
sentences.chinese: 使用圖形界面上的菜單和鍵盤快捷鍵。

sentences.english: There are currently no graphical clients to aide in this configuration.
sentences.chinese: 當前還沒有圖形界面客戶羰來幫助進行配置。
